title: [Sepolia] Stuck syncing with "[1/12 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata: 38/39"
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `2.55.0-dev-473e0414`

OS & Version: Linux/Docker/Kubernetes

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
```yaml
        - sh
        - '-ac'
        - >
          exec erigon --datadir=/data --nat=extip:$(POD_IP) --port=30303
          --http=false --healthcheck --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090
          --authrpc.jwtsecret=/data/jwt.hex --authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0
          --authrpc.port=8551 --authrpc.vhosts=* --metrics
          --metrics.addr=0.0.0.0 --metrics.port=6060 --chain=sepolia
          --maxpeers=200 --torrent.download.rate=1000mb
          --torrent.download.slots=100 --log.console.verbosity=4
          --torrent.verbosity=5
```

Consensus Layer: Teku 

Consensus Layer Command (with flags/config): 
```yaml
    args:
        - '--config-file=/config/config.yaml'
        - '--data-base-path=/data'
        - '--metrics-enabled=true'
        - '--metrics-host-allowlist=*'
        - '--metrics-port=8008'
        - '--log-destination=CONSOLE'
        - '--rest-api-cors-origins=*'
        - '--rest-api-enabled=true'
        - '--rest-api-host-allowlist=*'
        - '--log-include-validator-duties-enabled=true'
```

Chain/Network:  Sepolia

#### Expected behaviour
Expected node to start syncing with clear logs showing progress

#### Actual behaviour
Seeing repeating logs 

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Run erigon on Kubernetes in AWS EKS on EC2 nodes

#### Logs
```

What are these logs showing? Is there anything I need to do when running in AWS?

hello. 

what if you do next step?
stop erigon 
rm datadir/snapshots/v1-004400-004500-transactions.seg*
start erigon

> hello.
> 
> what if you do next step? stop erigon rm datadir/snapshots/v1-004400-004500-transactions.seg* start erigon

Is this documented anywhere? Am I supposed to delete all those .seg files?

```
